If your android phone is rooted, you can use this app to retrieve the Wifi passwords that are saved when you connect to a network.

This version of this program has been forked from the original and updated to support Android 8+. There is a pull request for it right here.

This program comes with ABSOLUTELY NO WARRANTY. It is free software, and you are welcome to redistribute it under certain conditions â€” see the GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE for details.
